title: Mazda2 | Australia's Best Small Hatchback & Sedan

meta.name: description
meta.content: It's time to join the 2Tribe. Discover the advanced technology, chic style and undeniable fuel-efficiency that make Mazda2 the ultimate little performer.

props.xmlString:
Ready for you

There's nothing like your tribe. Together you're more powerful. You look out for each other, there's nowhere you can't go and nothing you can't do.

props.blurb:
Loved for its smarts

Mazda2 is as switched on as it is stylish. That's why it doesn’t take long for its inner intelligence to shine through.

props.title: MZD Connect
props.blurb:
Access your compatible smartphone’s contacts, music and online feeds through MZD Connect, Mazda’s advanced touch screen infotainment system.

*Available on Maxx, Genki and GT only

Learn more >

props.title: Active Driving Display
props.blurb:
This handy screen shows your current speed and puts important navigation info straight into your line of sight.

*Available on Genki and GT only

props.title: i-STOP
props.blurb: Designed to help you save on fuel, this neat little function automatically stops your engine the moment you come to a standstill. *Available on Maxx, Genki and GT only

props.title: Steering-wheel controls
props.blurb: Both the phone and audio controls are conveniently located on the steering wheel to make it easier to switch tunes, or make hands-free calls.

props.title: Push button start
props.blurb: With Mazda2 you’ll have full control over your engine’s start/stop function at the touch of a button.

props.title: Multi-function commander
props.blurb:
Dial through menus and functions with the multi-function commander, designed for minimum distraction.

*Available on Maxx, Genki and GT only

props.title: Reverse camera
props.blurb:
Take the guesswork out of reverse parking with a handy rearview camera that guides you into the tightest of spots like a pro.

*Available on Maxx, Genki and GT only

props.xmlString:
Style Up

With a design inspired by the predatory stance of a wild animal, Mazda2 is the small, stylish and exciting car that’s ready for action at every turn.

Discover KODO Design >

options.name: Black Cloth
options.disclaimer: Available in Mazda2 Neo Hatch and Sedan.

options.name: Black Cloth
options.disclaimer: Available in Mazda2 Maxx Hatch only.

options.name: Black Cloth
options.disclaimer: Available in Mazda2 Maxx Sedan only.

options.name: Black Cloth
options.disclaimer: Available in Mazda2 Genki Hatch only.

options.name: Black Leather / Black Suede
options.disclaimer: Available in Mazda2 GT Sedan only.

options.name: Pure White Leather/Black Cloth
options.disclaimer: Available in Mazda2 GT Hatch only.

props.xmlString:
Performance, always on point

Mazda2 combines impressive fuel efficiency with uncompromised engine power to deliver an awesome driving experience. The thinking behind this revolution is called SKYACTIV TECHNOLOGY.

Discover SKYACTIV TECHNOLOGY >

props.heading: Protect your tribe
props.blurb: Intelligent safety in Mazda2 is on-hand and ready to help you live (and love) your life to the full.

props.heading: Blind Spot Monitoring (BSM)
props.blurb:
By scanning external mirrors’ blind spots up to 50m behind your vehicle, radars detect unseen vehicles to alert you of potential hazardous lane changes. *Available on Genki and GT only

 Learn more >

props.heading: Rear Cross Traffic Alert (RCTA)
props.blurb:
Assists you when reversing by warning if a car is approaching from either side. *Available on Genki and GT only

 Learn more >

props.heading: SMART CITY BRAKE SUPPORT – FORWARD (SCBS-F)
props.blurb:
Operating between 4-30km/h, SCBS monitors the vehicle in front to assess the likelihood of a collision. If there is a high risk, the system will warn you and brake automatically if needed.

Learn more >

props.heading: DYNAMIC STABILITY CONTROL (DSC) & TRACTION CONTROL SYSTEM (TCS)
props.blurb: DSC helps keep traction in all conditions to avoid skidding or loss of grip, while TCS regulates engine torque to minimise wheel-spin on challenging or uneven surfaces.

children.description: Nimble, sporty, and ready for action at every turn.

Mazda2 – the small car winning big with the judges

Drive Car of the Year - Best City Car 2017

Awards for Mazda2

Check out some of the latest awards snagged
by our small and stylish Mazda2.

2017 DRIVE CAR OF THE YEAR
'Overall the Mazda2's unrivalled safety package, presentation and dynamics ensures it's still the king of city cars in 2017'

Read more >
